name: GameGem
description:
GameGem - The story and Gameplay

You were kidnapped and trapped in a maze-like dungeon, you need the 4 gems to be able to escape the dungeon and go home.

  • Download the game for your Android device, and install.
  • Click start to commence the game
  • Punch the chasers (purple monsters) before they get to you by pressing the blue circle!
  • Defeat all the chasers in a level to get a key to continue to the next rooms
  • There are 4 rooms, each with different gems you have to collect to escape the dungeon!
  • Gain the Legendary Laser Crystal to ease your adventure! (go find out how :D)

Good Luck!
